description.en:
Noh Eunha.
After losing his family and closing off his heart, he just wanted to kill the monsters he loathed.

I regressed before my life came to an end in the deepest part of the <Abyss Dungeon> that was impossible for mankind to raid.

Since I’ve been reborn as a baby, let’s make this life different.
I will do anything for the sake of my happiness.

I’ll kill in order to live, and I’ll do my best to survive.
Even if I have to walk a thorny road by myself without anyone acknowledging me.

This life, I will definitely—
description.pt-br:
Noh Eunha.

Após perder sua família e fechar o coração, ele só queria matar os monstros que odiava.

Eu regredi antes que minha vida chegasse ao fim na parte mais profunda da <Abyss Dungeon> que era impossível para a humanidade invadir.

Desde que renasci como um bebê, vamos tornar esta vida diferente.
Eu farei qualquer coisa pela minha felicidade.

Vou matar para viver e farei o meu melhor para sobreviver.
Mesmo que eu tenha que percorrer um caminho espinhoso sozinho sem que ninguém me reconheça.

Nesta vida, eu definitivamente...

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

altTitles.ja: 大蛇に嫁いだ娘

altTitles.en: The Girl Who Married the Big Snake
The Girl Who Married The Great Snake

description.en: Miyo, a human girl dedicated as an offering to the snake, the lord of the mountain. Miyo was frightened in front of a large snake that had a big body and swallowed a fox, but her feelings gradually changed...

altTitles.ja: 黒ギャルさんが来る！

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?

altTitles.en: Reincarnation of the Suicidal Battle God

altTitles.es: Doom Breaker: Venganza contra los Dioses

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่นักรบพันธุ์ระห่ำ

altTitles.ja: 闘神転生記～世界を救うセカンドチャンス～

description.de:
Zephyr kämpft als letzter Überlebender der Menschheit gegen das Böse in einer von den Göttern verlassenen Welt. Als er in einer Schlacht von Tartarus, dem Gott der Zerstörung, getötet wird, scheint alle Hoffnung für die Menschheit verloren. Doch Zephyrs Schicksal ist nicht besiegelt. Die Götter, für die seine Kämpfe als Unterhaltung dienen, geben ihm eine zweite Chance und schicken ihn zehn Jahre in die Vergangenheit, als er noch ein Sklave war und nicht der mächtigste Mensch der Welt. Kann Zephyr sich an Tartarus rächen und die Frau retten, die er liebt, oder ist er dazu verdammt, die Vergangenheit zu wiederholen?

---

description.en:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

description.es:
Céfiro es el último humano capaz de enfrentarse al mal en un mundo abandonado por los dioses. Tras caer en batalla a manos de Tártaro, el dios de la destrucción, la esperanza de la humanidad se esfuma rápidamente. Sin embargo, el destino de Céfiro no está grabado a fuego; los dioses que se entretuvieron observando sus batallas le han dado la posibilidad de volver a vivir su vida y lo han enviado diez años al pasado, a la época en la que Céfiro era un esclavo y no el humano más poderoso de todos. ¿Podrá Céfiro vengarse de Tártaro y salvar a la mujer que ama? ¿O estará condenado a repetir el pasado?

description.fr:
Zéphyr est le plus puissant des humains et le dernier survivant dans un monde complètement détruit par Tartaros, le Dieu des démons. Malgré sa défaite, les Dieux qui trouvaient la misère et le malheur des humains comiques et divertissants ont trouvé son combat amusant et ont été assez stupides pour donner une seconde chance à Zéphyr, afin qu'il puisse remonter le temps pour sauver l’humanité. Cette fois-ci, Zéphyr ne se laissera pas faire. Il parviendra au sommet et brisera tous les obstacles pour anéantir ces fichus Dieux une bonne fois pour toutes!

"Anche se gli dei disgustosi mi hanno dato questa possibilità, un'opportunità è sempre un'opportunità. Visto che vogliono morire, li accontenterò." L'ultimo sopravvissuto dell'umanità, Zephyr. La lotta con i demoni finì con la sconfitta dell'umanità, gli viene concessa la possibilità di tornare indietro di 10 anni dagli dei. I demoni che hanno portato via tutto agli umani e agli dei che hanno trattato la rovina dell' umanità come un passatempo. Questa volta, li farò a pezzi.

人類最強男の生き返りアクションファンタジー。 「忌々しい神がくれたとはいえ、これはチャンス。ぶっ潰されたいなら、そうしてやるよ」 人類最後の生存者ゼフィール。魔神との孤独な戦いは敗北に終わったが、神々がくれた機会で10年前にタイムスリップ。 全てを奪い去った魔神と娯楽として人間の観察を楽しむ神。 「次は俺がお前らをぶっ潰してやる！」

description.ko:
인류 최강자의 회귀 액션 판타지.
"역겨운 신들이 줬다고 해도 기회는 기회. 뒈지고 싶다는데 죽여 줘야지."
인류 최후의 생존자 제피르.  마신과의 고독한 싸움은 패배로 끝났으나, 신들이 준 기회로 10년 전으로 돌아왔다. 
모든 것을 빼앗아갔던 마신과 인간을 구경거리 취급한 신들. 이번에는 내가 너희를 물어뜯겠다.

description.ru:
Возвращение самой желанной фантазии человечества.
"Уж если противные боги дали мне этот шанс, я воспользуюсь им. Хоть я и хочу умереть, но я должен убить их."
Джефир - последний оставшийся в живых человек. Битва с демонами закончилась поражением, но боги дали ему возможность вернуться на 10 лет назад. Демоны, которые забрали у людей всё, и боги, которые спокойно наблюдали за этим. В этот раз я не дам вам спокойно жить.

---

description.th:
เว็บตูนแนวแอคชันแฟนตาซีเกิดใหม่ที่ดีที่สุดตลอดกาล! "แม้ผู้มอบให้คือเทพเจ้าที่น่าสะอิดสะเอียนแต่โอกาสก็คือโอกาส ก็มันบอกว่าอยากตายงั้นก็ต้องจัดให้สิ" แม้ว่าการต่อสู้กับเทพปิศาจ จะลงเอยด้วยความพ่ายแพ้ ผู้รอดชีวิตคนสุดท้ายของมนุษยชาติอย่าง 'เซเฟอร์' นั้นได้รับโอกาสจากเหล่าทวยเทพให้ย้อนเวลากลับไปเมื่อสิบปีก่อน เทพปิศาจช่วงชิงทุกอย่างไปจากมนุษย์,ส่วนเทพเจ้าก็ปฏิบัติกับมนุษย์เหมือนเป็นเพียงของเล่น "ครั้งนี้แหละ ข้าจะเป็นคนตัดคอพวกเจ้าเอง"

description.uk:
Зефір — остання людина, що бореться зі злом у світі, покинутому богами. Коли його вбиває Тартарус, бог руйнування, уся надія для людства здається втраченою. Але доля Зефіра не вирішена — боги, які вважають його битви захопливими, подарували йому другий шанс на життя, і відправляють його на десять років у минуле, до того часу, коли він був рабом, а не наймогутнішою живою людиною. Чи зможе Зефір помститися Тартарусу і врятувати кохану жінку, або ж він приречений повторити минуле?

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

altTitles.ja: 地獄楽
ジャンプコミックス

altTitles.th: สุขาวดีอเวจี

description.en:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!
description.ru: Это случилось во времена правления одиннадцатого сёгуна из династии Токугава… Габимару, некогда сильнейший синоби, собиравшийся покинуть свою деревню, захвачен в плен. Но Ямада Асаэмон, девушка-палач, предложила ему прощение и свободу с одним условием… Он должен заполучить в райских землях эликсир бессмертия!.. Романтические приключения и искусство ниндзюцу от Каку Юдзи.
description.pt-br: Gabimaru, o Vazio, é um dos ninjas assassinos mais cruéis que já saiu da vila de Iwagakure. Ele é implacavelmente eficiente, mas uma traição resulta em uma sentença de morte. Só há uma esperança para ter sua liberdade: viajar para uma ilha escondida e conseguir um elixir, que tornará o shogun imortal. O fracasso não é uma opção, nesta ilha, o Céu e o Inferno estão a um metro de distância.

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultra God Mission!!!!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボールヒーローズ：ウルトラゴッドミッション

description.en: Continuation of the Super Dragon Ball Heroes manga series and adaptation to the video game of the same name. Goku and Vegeta face new opponents from across parallel timelines and different universes!

altTitles.ja: おとなりコンプレックス

description.en: Kuji Akira and Ninomiya Makoto have been neighbours and friends from childhood. Akira is handsome and Makoto is pretty but Akira's a girl and Makoto's a boy… Their feelings for each other are growing more complex just as they are finding themselves the focus of romantic interest of their friends and acquaintances.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.

altTitles.ja: クラッシク

description.en: After being accepted by the Melite Conservatory of Music, Taki Ren, travels all the way to the City of Music, Vienna, to fulfill her dream of becoming a composer. However, there's one problem: Melite is an all-boy's school! Her classmates are all musical geniuses, but they also come with problems!

While in hot pursuit of wanted criminals, police officer Do Gyeong Joon has an unexpected encounter with a rather uncanny demon. Barely surviving the accident, he is left baffled, staring at the sky at the retreating form of the mysterious being he had just met. However, not long after, the two meet again when the demon crashes into Gyeong Joon’s apartment, whispering,  
“Hurry up! I need to get inside you-”

Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou: Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.en: Unrivaled Summoner Starts From Level 1: Destroy All the Reincarnated People in the Secret Dungeon That Only I Can Use

description.en:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de māmā shì dà míngxīng

description.en: What will happen when an overly-supportive daughter discovers loads of photos of her mom, a famous actress, on the internet posing with her female co-stars in ways that "friends" would not do?

Upon a kingdom ravaged by war, descended a Dragon promising triumph and life eternal - a proposal accepted, a proposal respected, but one that would come at a severe price for the inhabitants.

Now the kingdom is in ruins. How come? It's for amnesiacs 'Missy' and Jess to find out.

______________

Devious Miss Crimson is a short story by RedbowCR (Crimson Ribbon: Summer Rain) aiming to provide a concise but complete narrative for the reader.

My second ever manga made as I gear up to tackle my next projects, I hope you will enjoy what this fun little story can provide to you, let's look forward to the future.

More of my garbage on: https://linktr.ee/redbowcr

title.en: Hanazono-kun to Kazoe-san no Fukakai na Houkago

altTitles.en: Hanazono and Kazoe's Bizarre After School Get Together
Hanazono and Kazoe's Bizarre After School Rendezvous

altTitles.ja: 花園君と数さんの不可解な放課後

description.en:
Kazoe, a girl sheltered from perverse content, and Hanazono, a boy brought up in a family that lives off of the perverse. As Kazoe is finally unable to restrain her curiosity, she turns to Hanazono for help.  
  
This is the story of the two engaging in high intensity consensual knowledge sharing.
description.pt-br: Kazoe, uma garota que foi protegida de todo tipo de conteúdo sexual, e Hanazono, um garoto que cresceu em uma família que vive (ou trabalha) de perversão (conteúdo sexual). Quando Kazoe fica livre para saciar sua curiosidade, ela procura Hanazono para a ajudar. Essa é a história dos dois em que eles compartilham intensamente seus conhecimentos entre si.

title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

description.en: The "psycho suspense" manga follows Godai, a policeman who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?
After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.

altTitles.ja: 無限のスキルゲッター！

description.en:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)

Low-grade guide, Qin Yun is forcibly marked by divine-grade sentry tyrant Mersherie. An aggressive maiden-heart seme x serious straightforward uke start an unbashful and unabashed companion life, conquering the whole universe while at it.

altTitles.ja: 復讐チャンネル ウラミン ～公開処刑ナマ配信中～

description.en:
The online video site "Uramin TV" is a popular channel that distributes videos depicting punishment on harmful people and has over 3 million subscribers. 
Minori Yoshiura, also known as "Uramin", who runs this site, has enthusiastic followers, but in fact, she was bullied horribly when she was in elementary school and became a shut-in. She vows to take revenge on her bullying perpetrators and broadcasts her revenge videos live. The number one target is Takemura Kyouka, the ringleader of bullying who has pushed her to the depths of hell and is now living a carefree life!

altTitles.ja: 恐竜とカッパのいる図書室

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

altTitles.en: Return with the Power of the King

description.en:
“I’ll eat all your skills!”

Kim Taehyun, whose awakening level remains undetermined, was treated as a loser because he failed to awaken. However, he awakened his ability at the moment of his death when a gate was created which lead to the king. 

Regresses to when he was 19 due to the power of the king, Taehyun gains a new skill called Predation.

[Skill has been devoured].

Using this power, I can be placed among the best.

altTitles.ja: 魔鬼

description.en:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."

In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions.

---
The lady trapped in the tower is being forced into a marriage. Her husband has killed or exiled his previous wives several times. The frightened princess eventually wakes up the sarcophagus in the basement and calls out the devil....

"I don't want to marry him, Raven."

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

description.ja:
塔に閉じ込められた公女に縁談の話が持ち上がる。彼女の旦那になる男は前妻を何人も殺したと言われる残虐な老人。恐ろしくなった公女は地下室の石棺を壊し悪魔を呼び出すのだが…「悪魔よ、わたくしはあの方と結婚したくありません」

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1165)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32223)
* Japanese / 日本語: [Comico](https://www.comico.jp/comic/8141), [Mecha Comics](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/141901)
description.zh:
贡女伊奈特与双胞胎弟弟约翰被母亲分离，从此伊奈特被关在了房里。直到成人，她也没有能再见到约翰。在她结婚的第一天晚上，丈夫不知缘由地被杀害。直到某天，她再次有了婚约，而即将成为她丈夫的男人，传闻是个残忍的老头，并杀死了他好几个前妻。因此害怕的她来到了地下室，打破了石棺，召来了魔鬼，希望能够阻止这场婚约。而就在她许下愿望的那天晚上，约翰的房间里却传出了奇怪的尖叫声……

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

altTitles.ja: ピンサロスナイパー

description.en: Office worker by day, pink lady at night and her third face… deadly! She is beautiful, dangerous and determined to clean-up her city from the scum that cross paths with her. Follow Yuki in her adventures as the Pink Salon Sniper!

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

title.en: Kimi to Sekai ga Owaru Hi ni

altTitles.en: Love You as the World Ends

altTitles.ja: 君と世界が終わる日に

description.en: On the day of his proposal, Hibiki Mamiya, a young man, is trapped in a tunnel collapse accident. When he narrowly escapes from the tunnel, the world has completely changed. A dilapidated cityscape, countless bodies, and the "living dead" wandering around the city... Amidst this abnormal situation, Hibiki desperately searches for his lover, but he is nowhere to be found. Will the few survivors survive together in this hopeless situation? The manga is based on the television drama, "Love You as the World Ends".

altTitles.ja: アカイリンゴ

description.en: Japan in the Reiwa XX era, where sexual activity is illegal. Hikaru Inuta, an honor student whose father is the director of the Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare's Sexual Enforcement Division, witnesses something shocking at a club he visits for the first time with his friend. There are a lot of people who enjoy sex with a great deal of alcohol and music! And among them is Inuta's favorite idol, Misora. In front of this unusual sight, an impulse that he's never felt runs around Inuta's body!!
description.ru:
Япония вошла в эпоху Рейва XX, во время которой сексуальные отношения стали незаконными. Хикару Инута — отличник, отец которого — директор отдела по борьбе с сексуальными преступлениями в Министерстве здравоохранения, труда и социального обеспечения. Инута становится свидетелем шокирующих событий в клубе, в который он впервые попадает вместе со своим другом. Он видит людей, которые занимаются сексом, пьют много алкоголя и слушают громкую музыку! И среди них оказывается кумир Инуты — актриса Мизора. Столкнувшись с таким необычным зрелищем, Инута вдруг ощущает то, чего не испытывал раньше.

(source: mangalib)
description.vi: Lệnh Hòa năm XX, Nhật Bản đã thông qua một bộ luật cấm hoàn toàn việc quan hệ tình dục. Hikaru Inuta là một cậu học sinh danh dự có cha là một chỉ huy cấp cao trong Setori, cục kiểm soát hoạt động tình dục thuộc Bộ Y Tế, Lao Động, và Phúc Lợi. Một ngày nọ cậu được người bạn của mình rủ tới một câu lạc bộ ngầm bất hợp pháp, nơi mọi người tới để ăn chơi hưởng lạc. Bất ngờ thay cậu đã gặp được nữ minh tinh nổi tiếng hàng đầu hiện nay và là thần tượng của mình tại đây. Mọi chuyện sau đó sẽ ra sao?

altTitles.ja: 冥天レストラン

description.en: As the distinguished son of a family who run a financial conglomerate, Gatarou Barazono took full advantage of his money to live a rosy life and enjoy it to its fullest. But one day, he suddenly got hit by a truck, and when he awoke, he found himself in the "Afterlife!" There, he finds the dubious-looking "Meiten Restaurant" (Underworld Restaurant), where the deceased are served their final meal before going to rest in peace...

altTitles.ja: 人狼機ウィンヴルガ 叛逆編

description.en: The adventure of a girl who has lost her memory begins...
description.es-la: Win, una chica que se despierta en un mundo extraño, salva a una chica llamada Kyu de ser perseguida por lobos en el bosque, y ella le permite vivir en su mansión. En la mansión, Nigou, la maestra de Kyu, le enseña todo tipo de cosas para convertirse en una auténtica guerrera...

title.en: Rise of the Kowtowing Girl ~Sacrificial Revenge Game~

altTitles.ja: 土下座少女の下剋上 ～生贄リベンジゲーム～

altTitles.en: The Ascendance of the Dogeza Girl ~Sacrifice Revenge Game~

description.en: In a mysterious school, there is a class where students with the lowest grades are sent, named the "isolated class". Akari, an ordinary female student, falls into the "isolated class" due to her friend's betrayal, where she is exposed to irrational senseless violence! However, she stands up to the members who dominate the class with an unyielding heart. At the same time, Akari joins forces with Yuto, another student who has fallen into the segregated class, and vows to climb out of this mess...

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ心霊マンション

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

altTitles.ja: 男主人公は丁重にお断りします！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我會禮貌地拒絕男主角

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

---

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)

altTitles.fr: Le régresseur de la famille déchue

description.en:
A life filled with regrets.

Once he realized his faults and decided to lead a new life, it was too late. His family was already gone.

He had borne through each day with pure rage. Finally at the end of his misery, his wish reached the heavens—an unforgiven one.

He goes against fate to raise his sword.
description.ko:
후회로만 가득한 생.

스스로의 잘못을 깨닫고 다시 사람이 되고자 했을 때,
이미 가문은 불타 사라진 뒤였다.

발악 같은 분노로 하루하루 연명하던 삶.
그 절망의 끝에서, 간절한 염원이 하늘에 닿았다.

용서받지 못한 자.
운명을 거슬러 검을 들다.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

altTitles.es-la: Regreso del ranker de clase SSS

description.en:
What would you do with the chance to become far greater than your greatest rivals… before they could even start?

When a dominant guild gangs up on Rokan to humiliate him and destroy his hard-earned achievements in the world's most realistic fantasy VR game, he becomes desperate for revenge. But just when Rokan thinks he's lost it all, a twist in space-time sends him back to right before the game is even launched.

Now, this former SSS-class ranker sees the perfect opportunity to return to glory!
description.ko:
가상현실 게임 더 로드(The Lord)에서 최강자로 군림한 '폭력의 왕' 로칸.
적대 길드에서 내린 척살령으로 모든 것을 잃게 된다.
그런데, 자고 일어나니 3년 전 과거로 회귀했다!

"빌어먹을 자식들아, 기다려라. 모조리 씹어 먹어줄 테니까!"

과거로 회귀하여 다시 한 번 최강자로 군림하는 로칸의 이야기가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Lokan era o ‘Rei da Violência’ que reinou como o mais forte no jogo de realidade virtual, ‘The Lord’. Infelizmente, a ordem de assassinato emitida por uma guilda inimiga fez com que ele perdesse tudo. Para sua surpresa, da próxima vez que acordou, ele havia voltado três anos no tempo!

“Vermes do caralho, espere. Vou devorar todos vocês!”

Uma nova história começa quando Lokan, que viajou de volta no tempo, sobe de volta ao topo!

altTitles.th: โฮริมิยะ สาวมั่นกับนายมืดมน

altTitles.ja: ホリミヤ

description.en:
Kyoko Hori is your average teenage girl… who has a side she wants no one else to ever discover. Then there's her classmate Izumi Miyamura, your average glasses-wearing boy — who's also a totally different person outside of school. When the two unexpectedly meet, they discover each other's secrets, and a friendship is born.

Read the official English release on [MangaUp](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/122).
description.fr:
D'un côté, il y a Hori, la lycéenne à la mode et populaire à première vue, mais qui est en fait une fille très simple et qui pense avant tout à sa famille. Et de l'autre, il y a Miyamura, le lycéen réservé qui se cache derrière ses lunettes, mais qui est en réalité un garçon chaleureux et aux nombreux piercings. Que se passe-t-il quand les deux se rencontrent par hasard sous leur véritable jour ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Nobi Nobi**
description.ru: Хори пытается казаться обычной старшеклассницей, тогда как на самом деле уделяет все свое время уходу за домом. Из-за постоянного отсутствия родителей-трудоголиков девушке приходится заменять младшему брату семью, заниматься уборкой, стиркой и прочими домашними делами. Однажды она встречает человека, который, так же как и она, старается не открывать свою настоящую сторону личности в школе: Миямура - молчаливый парень в очках. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться и раскрыть настоящих себя, не боясь, что об этом узнают в школе.
description.tr:
Kyoko Hori sıradan... ve kimsenin keşfetmemesini istediği bir tarafı olan liseli bir kız. Ve tabii bir de sınıf arkadaşı olan Izumi Miyamura var, sınıfın klasik gözlüklü çocuğu — ve okul dışında kesinlikle bambaşka birisine dönüşüyor.

İkisi bir rastlantıyla tanıştıklarında, birbirlerinin sırlarını öğreniyorlar, ve bir arkadaşlık ilişkisi kuruluyor.
description.pt-br: O doce e levemente ácido gostinho da juventude!! De um lado, Hori-san, que à primeira vista faz o tipo patricinha, mas na verdade é uma garota simples e prendada. Do outro, Miyamura-kun, que na escola emana um ar negativo com seus óculos e aparência sem graça, quando na verdade é um gato cheio de piercings. O que acontece quando o acaso faz com que esses dois, que parecem ser tão diferentes, mas têm tanto em comum, se encontrem.?!

title.en: The love princess of His Royal Highness the King's younger brother ~ After breaking off the engagement with the prince, I was captured by the beautiful King's younger brother.

altTitles.ja: 王弟殿下の恋姫 ～王子と婚約を破棄したら、美麗な王弟に囚われました

altTitles.fr: L'Idylle de la Princesse et du frère cadet du roi~ Prise au Piège par sa beauté après l'Annulation de mes Fiançailles avec le Prince ~

description.en:
Melissa, the prince’s fiancée, bravely endures difficult days after being openly deceived. Since her childhood, she has trained every day to become an illustrious queen, but perhaps this marriage is doomed to failure. That’s when the king’s "younger brother" appears, Ashley, who loves to tease her.

"Well, how about some time and freedom?"

Melissa’s love and life take an unexpected turn!
description.fr:
Melissa, fiancée du prince, endure courageusement des jours difficiles après avoir été ouvertement trompée. Depuis son enfance, elle s'est entraînée chaque jour pour devenir une illustre reine, mais peut-être que ce mariage est voué à l'échec. C'est alors qu'apparaît le " frère cadet" du roi, Ashley, qui adore la taquiner.

"Eh bien, que dirais-tu d'avoir un peu de temps et de liberté ?"

L'amour et la vie de Melissa prennent un tournant inattendu !

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: Saikyou ni Uzai Kanojo no, Asu kara Tsukaeru Mount Lesson

altTitles.ja: 最強にウザい彼女の、明日から使えるマウント教室

altTitles.en: The Most Annoying Girlfriend's Mount Class, Available Tomorrow
How to Handle Your Super Annoying Girlfriend: A Practical Guide

description.en:
Mount! is the ultimate ranking method that has been passed down since ancient times.
At Saginomiya Academy, a private school for children of the upper class, there is an absolute rule: It is to take mount and win! 

Rei Satou, who is the very definition of average, is destined to be in the lowest class. Where he will spend three years being bullied by the rich. At this point, the only way to survive is to rise to the S class.  But before his shocked eyes, a beautiful stranger suddenly appears. Tsukinami Senri kisses him out of the blue and says, 

"Let's be lovers and take the happiness mount!" "How come?!"

Team up with the most annoying girlfriend and aim for the top of the school!
description.ja:
笑える頭脳バトル爆誕！！！！！
「マウンティング！」それは、古代より伝わる最強の格付け方法である。
上流階級の子息が集まる私立鷺ノ宮学園には、絶対のルールが存在する。
それは、マウントを取って勝ち上がること！　ザ・一般人の佐藤零は、このままでは最下位クラス確定。お金持ちに虐げられる３年間を送ることに。生き残るにはSクラスに上がるしかない。
愕然とする彼の前に、突然現れた見知らぬ美少女。月並千里は、いきなりキスして言う。
「幸せマウントを取るため、私と恋人になって！」「なんで!?」
最強にウザい彼女と手を組んで、学園の頂点を目指せ！　
小学館ライトノベル大賞・優秀賞受賞作。ドタバタ展開てんこ盛り、新時代エンタメをとくと見よ！

title.en: "SHOPSKILL" Sae Areba, Dungeon ka Sita Sekaidemo Rakusyou da: Hakugai Sareta Shounen no Saikyou Zamaa Life

altTitles.ja: 『ショップ』スキルさえあれば、ダンジョン化した世界でも楽勝だ ～迫害された少年の最強ざまぁライフ～

altTitles.es-la: Con mi Habilidad "Tienda", es Fácil Conquistar un Mundo de Mazmorras.

altTitles.en: As Long as I Have the [Shop] Skill, I'll Have an Easy Life Even in a World That Has Been Transformed Into a Dungeon!

altTitles.ja-ro: “Shop” Skill Sae Areba, Dungeon-ka Shita Sekai Demo Rakushou da

description.en: High school student Boji Nichiro is isolated from the rest of the world due to fierce bullying. One day, however, the world is transformed by the "dungeonisation" phenomenon! In the midst of the chaos, Nichiro awakens the unique skill "Shop". It was an out-of-the-box skill that allowed him to buy everything from food and daily necessities to unrealistic items! The start of a painful and "wacky" modern fantasy from "Shosetsu-kaerou"!
description.ja: 壮絶なイジメを受け、孤立していた高校生・坊地日呂。だが、ある日《ダンジョン化》現象により世界は一変する！　混乱の中、日呂に覚醒したユニークスキル『ショップ』。それは、食料や日用品から非現実的なアイテムまでなんでも買える規格外のスキルだった――！　“小説家になろう”発痛快“ざまぁ”の現代ファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Hiro es un estudiante que no confía en nadie. Él se ve envuelto en una catastrofe mundial. La aparición de monstruos convirtió al mundo en una mazmorra y Hiro tendrá que usar su nueva habilidad para sobrevivir.

altTitles.ja: アーティストアクロ
神艺魔手
黏土魔法師

description.en: Once upon a time, artists were able to use their special skills freely, until seven years ago with a group of artists began using souls as raw materials for their work. Now society lives in fear of artists as a young man named Acro Hamburger travels to the capital city to ply his trade as a sculptor and to realize his dream of becoming a great artist.

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Become a Shrine Maiden for Books!"
Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Even Join the Temple to Read Books!"

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第二部 「本のためなら巫女になる！」

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」

description.en:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!
